segments.text: I notice the boy stretching toward the cookie jar, almost defying gravity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is commendable, but that stool looks like it could tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl stands beside him with her arm up, waiting eagerly for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re working together like a well-oiled machine of mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But it strikes me how foolish it is, climbing that shaky stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The moment I expect an accident to happen, I find myself holding my breath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why doesn't their mother notice? It’s almost infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR
